blockquote.p: Important: All users are encouraged to consult the release errata before installing &os; or submitting a problem report. The errata document is updated with late-breaking information discovered late in the release cycle or after the release. Typically, it contains information on known bugs, security advisories, and corrections to documentation. An up-to-date copy of the errata for &os; 8.4-RELEASE can be found on the &os; Web site.

body.p: A list of all platforms currently under development can be found on the Supported Platforms page.
